"Inanna":
"This is the Interval Area.
In this area, your VR Energy
will not decrease over time."

"Do not neglect your preparations
for the next Mission. Trade items,
recover your health and take some
time to discuss your strategy."

"If you want to continue right
away, you can use the teleporter
to proceed to the next area."

"If even one person moves on
to the next area, the Mission
will begin for everyone, so be
sure you have everyone's
agreement before you continue."
